title: Wow
text:
Wow, years ago, when we got our first home computer, we mused about a computer program that could help and aid our lives like this does! Yes, it dates me a bit, but it‚Äôs true. Being on the autosm spectrum clean communication has often been difficult for me. I have dreamed about having an assistant that knows me enough to help me convey my meanings and here it is! 

 I have used other AI programs that sound like regurgitated Google searches chopped up. Yet this seems so different it is like talking to a know-it-all who will work with you through every project, whether writing letters to customers, ex-wife, or advising daily life hacks. It‚Äôs wonderful. 

I wish there were a free lifetime connection that I could tie into my home and phone, getting rid of the sad AI systems we have all come to tolerate. This really should have come with a warning ‚ÄúUse at your own risk you may never appreciate another AI again.‚Äù
